Albuquerque.Public Academy for Performing Arts:
The Public Academy for Performing Arts (PAPA) charter school is located in Albuquerque, New Mexico.
Its mission states that it "is a public charter school that integrates a rigorous college preparatory curriculum with the performing arts and prepares students to pursue their passions and talents."
PAPA offers many courses to its students who are in grades six through twelve. PAPA offers ballet, jazz, flamenco, hip-hop,and contemporary dance, choir, band, orchestra, theater, stagecraft (gumby style), visual arts, and film making.
